transcript.title: MEETING WITH DALAI LAMA
transcript.content:
TEL:~~ J: I) F 1
4 3/ 92
MEETING WITH DALAI LAMA
I expect to have a private meeting with His Holiness, the
Dalai Lama, on Friday 8 May. The meeting has been arranged
in recognition of the Dalai Lama's position as a prominent
religious figure an~ d distinguished Nobel Laureate. may 1992
TEL A ZL
11" qw
